sentences.en: 'You had better go back to your Pantry, Martin,'he said.
sentences.cn: “ 马丁,你可以回到厨房去了, ” 他说.
食品储藏室与厨房毗连.

sentences.en: After they've finished with the pantry, the medicine cabinet, and the attic.
sentences.cn: 当他们整理晚餐具室 、 药品橱柜和小阁楼之后.

sentences.en: He wanted to find some wine in the pantry.
sentences.cn: 他想在餐具室里找到一些酒.

sentences.en: No food was left in the pantry except some bread.
sentences.cn: 食品柜里除了一些面包其它什么也不剩.

sentences.en: Nothing was left in the pantry except some eggs.
sentences.cn: 食品柜里除了一些鸡蛋外什么也没剩下.

sentences.en: Once she even managed to lock her mother into the pantry.
sentences.cn: 有一次她甚至将母亲锁在厨房里.

sentences.en: Prep the pantry with liquids, tea and chicken soup.
sentences.cn: 同时准备一些流质食物, 便当和鸡汤.

sentences.en: Prepare plans of each area, storage preparation, production, stewarding, and pantry locations.
sentences.cn: 准备各相关区域图纸, 包括仓库 、 加工间, 制作间 、 服务间和备餐等位置.

sentences.en: She went on working in the pantry as quiet as a mouse.
sentences.cn: 她到配餐间安静地工作去了.

sentences.en: Stock your pantry with protein snacks hard - boiled eggs - fat cheese.
sentences.cn: 在你食品柜中储躲富含蛋白质的零食 —— 熟蛋,瘦肉,和低脂芝士.

sentences.en: The hungry children made a raid on the pantry.
sentences.cn: 饥饿的孩子把食品柜洗劫一空.

sentences.en: The pantry plays a secondary role, as should dialog boxes.
sentences.cn: 食品储藏室应该处于从属地位, 对话框也应该如此.

sentences.en: We shall creep out quietly into the butler's pantry -'cried the Mole.
sentences.cn: “咱们可以偷偷爬进配膳室 —— ”鼹鼠喊道.

sentences.en: Well, go in the pantry and get that ham off the shelf.
sentences.cn: 那好吧, 你到食品柜把架子上的火腿拿来.

words.tran_cn: 餐具室；食品室；食品储藏室

trans.tran_cn: 餐具室，食品储存室，〈美俚〉胃
trans.tran_en: a very small room in a house where food is kept
